title: Kate Ritchie responds to rumours she is appearing on The Masked Singer
text:
The former Home and Away star is rumoured to be on The Masked Singer Australia.

And on Wednesday, Kate Ritchie addressed 'speculation that she could be the mystery celebrity inside the show's monster costume.

Speaking on her radio show, Nova's Kate, Tim and Marty, she said: 'I was dozing off last night and my ears did prick up to the sound of me being a suggestion.'

Is it her? Kate Ritchie (pictured) addressed claims that she is the celebrity inside the monster costume on The Masked Singer

On Tuesday, Masked Singer Australia judge Dave Hughes guessed that Kate might be a secret singer on the series.

Her co-host Marty added: 'I guess it makes sense that they mask the voice during the clue as well.'

'But it is their real singing voice or is it my singing voice... I don't know,' Kate jokingly said.

Who is it? On Tuesday, The Masked Singer judge Dave Hughes guessed that Kate was the celebrity behind the mask

Tim also explained that he believed she was one of the personalities on the show and he obviously 'wasn't the only one' who thought so.

The show's judges, Jackie 'O' Henderson, Lindsay Lohan and Dannii Minogue had also listed Vanessa Amorosi, Lisa McCune or Shania Twain as possible options.

Meanwhile, Darren McMullen was unmasked as the Prawn on The Masked Singer on Monday night.

'I guess it makes sense': Kate's co-hosts Tim (left) and Marty (right) also believe that she could be on the show

Speaking to news.com.au, he said that he hopes his singing sting on the show will help launch a musical theatre career.

'There's a couple of things coming up in Australia I would love to be involved in, big musical theatre shows,' he said.

'I needed to prove to myself and everybody else that I could sing on a big stage at that level,' he added.
description: The former Home and Away star is rumoured to be on The Masked Singer Australia.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
